greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{m=1..n} Sum_{i=1..m} F(i)F(i+1) where F(n)=Fibonacci numbers A000045.
comment: a(n) = F(n+1)F(n+2) - floor((n+2)/2). a(n) is the 2-fold convolution of F(n)F(n+1) A001654 with the sequence 1,1,1,....
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4,-3,-3,4,-1).
program: (Sage) f=fibonacci; [(4*f(n+1)*f(n+2)-2*n-3-(-1)^n)/4 for n in (0..30)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 23 2019
results.author: Mario Catalani (mario.catalani(AT)unito.it), Jan 31 2003
